Tras seguir el sonido, llegué a la planta superior, donde encontré una vieja habitación decrépita. Dentro, los llantos se hicieron más fuertes, y vi una cuna en el rincón. Cuando me acerqué, los llantos cesaron y una fría brisa se apoderó de la habitación. La cuna estaba vacía, pero sentí una presencia detrás de mí. Me volví y vi una figura sombría de pie en el umbral de la puerta, bloqueándome la salida. Me abrí paso y corrí, con los llantos resonando en mis oídos.

Evitad la cresta del sur cerca de Zatón. Estaba subiendo por el sendero cuando oí como me llamaban desde los árboles. Pensé que era un amigo y seguí la voz. Al acercarme, vi una figura al borde de la cresta que me hacía señas. Cuando tendí la mano, su rostro degeneró en una sonrisa grotesca y se abalanzó sobre mí. Retrocedí a trompicones, evitando por los pelos caerme. La figura desapareció y bajé corriendo, sintiendo sus ojos clavados en mí durante todo el camino.

Hay un viejo almacén en el Vertedero que todo el mundo dice que está maldito. Una noche, decidí explorarlo. Cuando entré, el aire llenó de polvo y oí débiles susurros. De repente, las luces parpadearon y vi sombras que se movían por los rincones. Los susurros se hicieron más fuertes y sentí una mano fría en la espalda. Me di la vuelta, pero no había nadie. Las sombras parecieron acercarse y eché a correr, mientras los susurros me seguían hasta el exterior. El almacén es un lugar pesadillesco.

Estaba andando por los oscuros callejones de Prípiat cuando noté una presencia detrás de mí. Tras girarme, vi una figura sombría y alta con ojos brillantes. Empezó a moverse hacia mí y yo sentí un miedo inmenso. Eché a correr, pero la figura me seguía, y sus pasos resonaban por las estrechas calles. Me escondí en un edificio antiguo, pero los ojos de la figura parecían atravesar las paredes. Solo desapareció cuando amaneció, dejándome temblando y aterrorizado.

Una noche, acampé cerca de la vieja base militar de Agroprom. Hacia medianoche, oí una débil música. La curiosidad me llevó a seguir el sonido hasta un edificio en ruinas. Dentro había un gramófono que tocaba una melodía antigua, pero no había nadie. Al acercarme, la música se distorsionó y sentí como una mano fría me agarraba el brazo. El aire se volvió denso y vi figuras sombrías bailando a mi alrededor. Salí corriendo, con la música aún resonando en mis oídos. La base está atormentada por los fantasmas del pasado.

Hermanos, el Monolito habla de espíritus oscuros que atormentan las ruinas occidentales. Una noche, me aventuré allí solo para buscar la ilustración. Mientras rezaba, el aire se enfrió y apareció una figura sombría que susurraba blasfemias. El suelo tembló y sentí como unas manos me agarraban las piernas, intentando arrastrarme hacia la tierra. Apenas pude escapar, y ahora sé que el Monolito pone a prueba nuestra fe a través de estos encuentros.

Alejaos de la vieja fábrica después del atardecer. Estaba meditando allí cuando oí pasos resonando por los pasillos vacíos. Se aproximaba una presencia oscura, cuyos ojos brillaban con una luz impura. Me tendió la mano y sentí un dolor punzante en el pecho. Huí, pero la figura me siguió, susurrando promesas de perdición. La fábrica está maldita por los enemigos del Monolito.

Cuidado con el bosque del norte, hermanos. Una noche, mientras buscaba orientación del Monolito, me rodearon figuras sombrías. Susurraban secretos ancestrales e intentaron llevarme por el mal camino. Sentí su aliento frío en mi cuello y sus manos me arrastraron hacia lo más profundo del bosque. Recité las oraciones sagradas y conseguí escapar, pero el bosque sigue siendo un lugar de gran peligro.

El Monolito nos ha advertido de espíritus que atormentan los túneles orientales. Mientras exploraba, sentí un pavor abrumador. Las paredes parecían cerrarse y oí gritos que resonaban en la oscuridad. De repente, una figura espectral se abalanzó sobre mí, con los ojos llenos de odio. Apenas conseguí repelerla con mi arma, y entonces supe que los túneles son un lugar de tormento.

Se han visto luces extrañas en los edificios abandonados. Una noche, las seguí, con la esperanza de encontrar una señal del Monolito. En su lugar, encontré una figura envuelta en la oscuridad. Susurraba conocimientos prohibidos e intentó llevarme por el mal camino. Sentí una mano fría sobre mi hombro y el aire se se llenó de miedo. Huí, sabiendo que algunos misterios no están pensados para ser comprendidos.

No os acerquéis a la orilla del río de noche. Mientras meditaba, vi figuras fantasmales caminando por la orilla, con una luz espeluznante emanando de sus ojos. Parecían tenderme la mano, que goteaba agua. Sentí un frío escalofriante y oí sus gritos lastimeros. El río es un lugar de gran pesar, y es mejor no perturbarlo.

El Monolito me ha mostrado visiones de un laboratorio embrujado. En mi afán por entender, me aventuré allí. Cuando entré, sentí una fuerte presencia. Se movían sombras en los rabillos de mis ojos y oí débiles susurros. De repente, apareció una figura con bata de laboratorio y el rostro retorcido por la agonía. Se abalanzó sobre mí y disparé mi arma, pero la bala la atravesó. Huí, y los susurros me siguieron todo el camino de vuelta.

En mitad de la noche, me aventuré a ir al viejo cementerio. Mientras rezaba, vi figuras fantasmales que surgían de las tumbas. Me tendieron la mano, con sus rostros contorsionados por el dolor. Sentí su frío tacto y oí sus gemidos de dolor. El suelo pareció moverse bajo mis pies y apenas pude escapar. El cementerio es un lugar de gran sufrimiento, y los espíritus no están en paz.

Cuidado con la escuela abandonada. Una noche, oí risas débiles procedentes del interior. Movido por la curiosidad, entré, pero las risas se convirtieron en gritos. Se movían sombras por sí solas y vi una figura al final del pasillo, con los ojos rojos. Se abalanzó sobre mí y sentí que me helaba el corazón. Corrí, pero los gritos me siguieron, resonando en la noche. La escuela está maldita por los espíritus del pasado.

El Monolito advierte de presencias oscuras en el viejo teatro. Fui allí en busca de orientación y descubrí un ambiente cargado de malevolencia. Cuando me acerqué al escenario, vi figuras sombrías representando una retorcida obra. Sus ojos brillaban con una luz espeluznante y sus voces resonaban con oscuras intenciones. De repente, una de ellas se abalanzó sobre mí y sentí una mano fría en el cuello. Huí, sabiendo que el teatro es un lugar de gran maldad.

Alejaos de las ruinas del sur después del anochecer. Estaba rezando allí cuando oí susurros que decían mi nombre. El aire se tornó frío y vi una figura entre las ruinas, cuyos ojos brillaban con una luz impura. Me hizo señas y sentí un pavor abrumador. Recé las oraciones sagradas y conseguí escapar, pero las ruinas siguen siendo un lugar de gran peligro.

Una noche, me aventuré a ir al viejo molino en busca de ilustración. Mientras rezaba, el viento se levantó y oí voces débiles que la brisa arrastraba. Se movían sombras a mi alrededor y vi figuras merodeando en la oscuridad. De repente, una de ellas se abalanzó sobre mí con los ojos enrojecidos. Me defendí de ella y huí, con las voces resonando en mi mente. El molino es un lugar de energía oscura y es mejor evitarlo.

El Monolito me ha mostrado visiones de un bosque encantado. Fui allí en busca de respuestas, pero los árboles parecían cerrarse a mi alrededor. Oí susurros en el viento y vi figuras que se movían entre las sombras. De repente, sentí una mano fría en el hombro y me giré para ver una figura fantasmal con los ojos hundidos. Eché a correr, y el bosque parecía retorcerse y cambiar a mi alrededor. Apenas conseguí salir, y ahora sé que algunos lugares no están hechos para ser explorados.

No os acerquéis al viejo puente de noche. Lo estaba cruzando cuando oí un gruñido grave desde abajo. Al mirar hacia abajo, vi un par de ojos brillantes que me miraban fijamente. El puente empezó a temblar y sentí que algo me agarraba por el tobillo e intentaba tirarme. Me resistí y conseguí liberarme y correr hacia el otro lado. El puente es un lugar de gran maldad, y es mejor dejarlo en paz.

Una noche, me aventuré a ir al viejo monasterio en busca de orientación. Al entrar, oí débiles cánticos que resonaban en las paredes. El aire se volvió más frío y vi figuras sombrías que se movían entre los bancos. De repente, la puerta se cerró de golpe y sentí una presencia detrás de mí. Al volverme, vi una figura con túnica y ojos brillantes que susurraba en un idioma desconocido. Las paredes parecían cerrarse y sentí un pavor abrumador. Forcé la puerta y eché a correr sin mirar atrás.

El Monolito advierte de espíritus que rondan la mina abandonada. Fui allí en busca de ilustración, pero, cuanto más me adentraba, más oscuro se volvía. Mi linterna parpadeó y oí pasos que resonaban detrás de mí. De repente, una brisa fría me envolvió y apagó la luz. Me arrastraron a la oscuridad y sentí una mano helada en el hombro. Grité y corrí a ciegas, tropezando con rocas y escombros. Cuando por fin salí, me di cuenta de que estaba solo. La mina es un lugar de gran peligro.

Alejaos de la vieja fábrica de Rostok. Estaba explorando la zona cuando oí la risa de un niño. Tras seguir el sonido, encontré un pequeño patio abandonado. Al acercarme, las risas se convirtieron en gritos y vi a una niña de pie junto a los columpios, con los ojos hundidos y negros. Me señaló con el dedo y el suelo a su alrededor empezó a resquebrajarse. Corrí, sintiendo como la tierra temblaba bajo mis pies. La fábrica es un lugar de gran sufrimiento.

El Monolito advierte de presencias oscuras en la antigua ciudad de Prípiat. Me aventuré allí en busca de ilustración, pero el aire estaba cargado de malevolencia. Mientras caminaba por las calles, vi con los rabillos de mis ojos figuras sombrías que se movían. Los susurros se hicieron más fuertes y sentí una mano fría en el hombro. Me di la vuelta, pero no había nada. La ciudad es un lugar de gran maldad, y es mejor evitarla.

Una noche, me aventuré a ir al viejo hotel de Limansk. Al subir las escaleras, oí el llanto de un bebé. Siguiendo el sonido, llegué a la planta superior, donde encontré una habitación vieja y decrépita. Dentro, el llanto se hizo más fuerte y vi una cuna en un rincón. Cuando me acerqué, el llanto cesó y una brisa fría se apoderó de la habitación. La cuna estaba vacía, pero sentí una presencia detrás de mí. Me giré y vi una figura sombría en la puerta, que me impedía salir. Me abrí paso a la fuerza y corrí, con los gritos resonando en mis oídos.

Stay away from the southern ridge near Zaton. I was hiking up the trail when I heard my name being called from the trees. Thinking it was a friend, I followed the voice. As I got closer, I saw a figure standing at the edge of the ridge, beckoning me. When I reached out, its face twisted into a grotesque grin, and it lunged at me. I stumbled back, barely avoiding a fall. The figure vanished, and I ran back down, feeling its eyes on me the entire way.

The Monolith warns of dark spirits haunting the western ruins. One night, I ventured there alone to seek enlightenment. As I prayed, the air grew cold and a shadowy figure appeared, whispering blasphemies. The ground trembled, and I felt hands grabbing at my legs, trying to pull me into the earth. I barely escaped, and now I know the Monolith tests our faith through these encounters.

Stay away from the old factory after dusk. I was meditating there when I heard footsteps echoing through the empty halls. A dark presence approached, its eyes glowing with an unholy light. It reached out to me, and I felt a searing pain in my chest. I fled, but the figure followed, whispering promises of doom. The factory is cursed by the Monolith's enemies.

Beware the northern forest, brothers. One night, while seeking guidance from the Monolith, I was surrounded by shadowy figures. They whispered ancient secrets and tried to lead me astray. I felt their cold breath on my neck and their hands pulling me deeper into the woods. I recited the sacred prayers and managed to escape, but the forest remains a place of great danger.

The Monolith has warned us of spirits haunting the eastern tunnels. While exploring, I felt an overwhelming sense of dread. The walls seemed to close in, and I heard screams echoing through the dark. Suddenly, a spectral figure lunged at me, its eyes filled with hatred. I barely managed to fend it off with my weapon, and I knew then that the tunnels are a place of torment.

Strange lights have been seen in the abandoned buildings. One night, I followed them, hoping to find a sign from the Monolith. Instead, I encountered a figure cloaked in darkness. It whispered forbidden knowledge and tried to lead me astray. I felt a cold hand on my shoulder, and the air grew thick with fear. I fled, knowing that some mysteries are not meant to be understood.

Stay clear of the riverbank at night. While meditating, I saw ghostly figures walking its shores, their eyes glowing with an eerie light. They seemed to reach out for me, their hands dripping with water. I felt a chilling cold and heard their mournful cries. The river is a place of great sorrow, and it is best left undisturbed.

The Monolith has shown me visions of a haunted laboratory. Seeking to understand, I ventured there. As I entered, I felt a heavy presence. Shadows moved in the corners of my vision, and I heard faint whispers. Suddenly, a figure in a lab coat appeared, its face twisted in agony. It lunged at me, and I fired my weapon, but it passed right through. I fled, the whispers following me all the way back.

In the dead of night, I ventured to the old cemetery. As I prayed, I saw ghostly figures rising from the graves. They reached out to me, their faces contorted in pain. I felt their cold touch and heard their sorrowful wails. The ground seemed to shift beneath my feet, and I barely escaped. The cemetery is a place of great suffering, and the spirits there are not at peace.

Beware the abandoned school. One night, I heard faint laughter coming from inside. Curious, I entered, but the laughter turned into screams. Shadows moved on their own, and I saw a figure standing at the end of the hall, its eyes glowing red. It charged at me, and I felt an icy grip on my heart. I ran, but the screams followed me, echoing through the night. The school is cursed by the spirits of the past.

The Monolith warns of dark presences in the old theater. I went there seeking guidance and found the air thick with malevolence. As I approached the stage, I saw shadowy figures performing a twisted play. Their eyes glowed with an eerie light, and their voices echoed with dark intent. Suddenly, one of them lunged at me, and I felt a cold hand on my neck. I fled, knowing that the theater is a place of great evil.

Stay away from the southern ruins after dark. I was praying there when I heard whispers calling my name. The air grew cold, and I saw a figure standing among the ruins, its eyes glowing with an unholy light. It beckoned to me, and I felt an overwhelming sense of dread. I recited the sacred prayers and managed to escape, but the ruins remain a place of great danger.

Clear Sky operatives, avoid the swamps after dark. I was on a solo patrol when I saw strange lights floating above the water. Thinking it was some kind of anomaly, I approached, but the lights began to circle around me. The air grew cold, and I felt a sinister presence. Suddenly, a shadowy figure emerged from the swamp, its eyes glowing with malevolence. I ran, but the figure followed, whispering my name. The swamps are haunted by lost souls, and they dont want us there.

Heard strange chanting near the southern research post. One night, I decided to investigate. As I approached the post, the chanting grew louder, and I felt a cold breeze. The air was thick with an unnatural fog, and I saw figures dancing around a fire. Their eyes glowed with an eerie light, and their voices echoed with dark intent. Suddenly, they turned towards me, and I felt an overwhelming sense of dread. I fled, but the chanting followed me all the way back.

Stay away from the old barn near the marshes. I went there looking for supplies and found the place eerily quiet. As I entered, I heard faint whispers calling my name. The air grew cold, and I saw shadowy figures moving in the corners of my vision. Suddenly, the door slammed shut, and I felt a presence behind me. Turning around, I saw a figure with hollow eyes staring at me. I ran, but the whispers followed me all the way back. The barn is haunted by restless spirits.

One night, I ventured into the old lab near Yantar. I was searching for information on anomalies when I heard a low hum. As I went deeper, the hum turned into whispers, calling my name. Suddenly, the lights flickered, and I saw figures moving in the shadows. I tried to leave, but the doors slammed shut. I felt a cold hand grip my shoulder, and the whispers turned into screams. I barely managed to pry the door open and escape. The lab is a place of dark energy.

Stay clear of the eastern tunnels. I was exploring the area when I heard footsteps echoing behind me. Turning around, I saw a figure standing in the darkness, its eyes glowing with an eerie light. It started to move towards me, and I felt an overwhelming sense of dread. I turned and ran, but the figure followed, its footsteps echoing through the tunnels. I barely made it out, and the entrance collapsed behind me. The tunnels are a place of great danger.

Avoid the old bridge near the southern checkpoint. I was crossing it one night when I heard a low growl from beneath. Looking down, I saw a pair of glowing eyes staring back at me. The bridge started to shake, and I felt something grab my ankle, trying to pull me down. I fought back, managing to break free and sprint to the other side. The bridge is cursed, and it is best left alone.

One evening, I decided to explore the abandoned village near the marshes. As I entered one of the houses, I felt a sudden chill. The air grew thick, and I heard faint whispers. I turned to leave, but the door wouldnt budge. The whispers grew louder, turning into agonized screams. Shadows swirled around me, and I felt hands grabbing at my clothes, pulling me back. I managed to break free and burst through a window to escape. The village is haunted by restless spirits.

Stay away from the northern forest after dark. I was on patrol when I saw a figure standing among the trees. As I approached, it vanished, but I felt an eerie presence. The air grew cold, and I heard whispers in the wind. Suddenly, a shadowy figure lunged at me, its eyes glowing with malevolence. I fired my weapon, but it had no effect. I ran, the whispers echoing in my mind. The forest is a place of dark energy, and it is best left undisturbed.

Theres an old barn near the marshes that everyone avoids. One night, curiosity got the better of me, and I went in. The deeper I went, the darker it became. My flashlight flickered, and I heard footsteps echoing behind me. Suddenly, a cold breeze swept through, extinguishing my light. I was plunged into darkness, feeling an icy hand on my shoulder. I screamed and ran blindly, stumbling over rocks and debris. When I finally emerged, I realized I was alone. The barn had taken my companions.

One evening, I ventured into the old hotel in Limansk. As I climbed the stairs, I heard a baby crying. Following the sound, I reached the top floor, where I found an old, decrepit room. Inside, the crying grew louder, and I saw a crib in the corner. When I approached, the crying stopped, and a cold breeze swept through the room. The crib was empty, but I felt a presence behind me. I turned and saw a shadowy figure standing in the doorway, blocking my exit. I forced my way past and ran, the cries echoing in my ears.

Stay away from the southern ridge near Zaton. I was hiking up the trail when I heard my name being called from the trees. Thinking it was a friend, I followed the voice. As I got closer, I saw a figure standing at the edge of the ridge, beckoning me. When I reached out, its face twisted into a grotesque grin, and it lunged at me. I stumbled back, barely avoiding a fall. The figure vanished, and I ran back down, feeling its eyes on me the entire way.

One night, I was camping near the Red Forest. Around midnight, I heard rustling outside my tent. Thinking it was an animal, I unzipped the flap and shone my flashlight. To my horror, I saw a man standing just outside, his eyes glowing a sickly green. He reached out, his mouth opening in a silent scream. I scrambled out of the tent and ran as fast as I could. When I looked back, he was gone, but the echo of his scream stayed with me for days.

I was exploring the abandoned village near the Cordon, searching for supplies. As I entered one of the houses, I felt a sudden chill. The air grew thick, and I heard faint whispers. I turned to leave, but the door wouldnt budge. The whispers grew louder, turning into agonized screams. Shadows swirled around me, and I felt hands grabbing at my clothes, pulling me back. I managed to break free and burst through a window to escape. I still hear the screams in my nightmares.

Stay away from the old train yard after dark. One night, I decided to search for spare parts. As I walked among the rusted carriages, I heard footsteps behind me. Turning, I saw nothing but darkness. Suddenly, a shadowy figure lunged at me, its eyes glowing red. I fired my gun, but the bullets passed right through it. I ran, hearing the figures rasping breath right behind me. I only stopped when I reached the safety of the campfire. The train yard is cursed.

I was trekking through the swamps when I got lost. The fog was thick, and visibility was low. Suddenly, I heard my name being called from the mist. I followed the voice, thinking it was a fellow stalker. As I approached, I saw a figure standing in the water, beckoning me. When I got closer, its face twisted into a grotesque grin, and it vanished. The water around me started to bubble, and I felt hands pulling me under. I barely made it out alive, but the swamp left its mark on me.

Theres an old bridge near the Garbage that everyone says is haunted. One night, I dared to cross it. Halfway across, I heard a low growl from beneath. Looking down, I saw a pair of glowing eyes staring back at me. The bridge started to shake, and I felt something grab my ankle, trying to pull me down. I fought back, managing to break free and sprint to the other side. I dont know what lives under that bridge, but Im never going back.

One evening, I decided to explore the old church in the Dark Valley. As I entered, I heard faint chanting echoing from the walls. The air grew colder, and I saw shadowy figures moving among the pews. Suddenly, the door slammed shut, and I felt a presence behind me. Turning around, I saw a robed figure with glowing eyes, whispering in an unknown language. The walls seemed to close in, and I felt an overwhelming sense of dread. I forced the door open and ran, never looking back.

Theres a cave near the Army Warehouses that everyone avoids. One day, curiosity got the better of me, and I went in. The deeper I went, the darker it became. My flashlight flickered, and I heard footsteps echoing behind me. Suddenly, a cold breeze swept through, extinguishing my light. I was plunged into darkness, feeling an icy hand on my shoulder. I screamed and ran blindly, stumbling over rocks and debris. When I finally emerged, I realized I was alone. The cave had taken my companions.

I was scavenging near the old factory in Rostok when I heard a childs laughter. Following the sound, I found a small, abandoned playground. As I approached, the laughter turned into screams, and I saw a little girl standing by the swings, her eyes hollow and black. She pointed at me, and the ground around her started to crack open. I ran, feeling the earth tremble beneath my feet. When I looked back, the playground was gone, replaced by an empty lot.

One night, I decided to camp near the Bar. Around midnight, I heard rustling in the bushes. Thinking it was an animal, I ignored it. Suddenly, I felt a cold hand grip my shoulder. I turned around, but there was nothing there. The hand tightened, and I heard a voice whispering in my ear, telling me to leave. I packed up and ran, feeling the presence follow me all the way to the safety of the campfire. The Bar is haunted, and it doesnt want us there.

Stay away from the Pripyat outskirts. I was exploring the abandoned buildings when I heard footsteps echoing through the halls. As I turned a corner, I saw a figure standing at the end of the hallway, its eyes glowing red. It started to move towards me, and I felt an overwhelming sense of dread. I turned and ran, but the figures footsteps were right behind me. I barely made it out, and when I looked back, the figure was gone. Pripyat is cursed, and its best left alone.

One evening, I ventured into the old hotel in Limansk. As I climbed the stairs, I heard a baby crying. Following the sound, I reached the top floor, where I found an old, decrepit room. Inside, the crying grew louder, and I saw a crib in the corner. When I approached, the crying stopped, and a cold breeze swept through the room. The crib was empty, but I felt a presence behind me. I turned and saw a shadowy figure standing in the doorway, blocking my exit. I forced my way past and ran, the cries echoing in my ears.

Avoid the southern ridge near Zaton. I was hiking up the trail when I heard my name being called from the trees. Thinking it was a friend, I followed the voice. As I got closer, I saw a figure standing at the edge of the ridge, beckoning me. When I reached out, its face twisted into a grotesque grin, and it lunged at me. I stumbled back, barely avoiding a fall. The figure vanished, and I ran back down, feeling its eyes on me the entire way.

Theres an old warehouse in the Garbage that everyone says is cursed. One night, I decided to explore it. As I entered, the air grew thick with dust, and I heard faint whispers. Suddenly, the lights flickered, and I saw shadows moving in the corners. The whispers grew louder, and I felt a cold hand on my back. I turned around, but no one was there. The shadows seemed to close in, and I ran, the whispers following me all the way out. The warehouse is a place of nightmares.

I was walking through the dark alleys of Pripyat when I felt a presence behind me. Turning around, I saw a tall, shadowy figure with glowing eyes. It started to move towards me, and I felt an intense fear. I ran, but the figure followed, its footsteps echoing through the narrow streets. I hid in an old building, but the figures eyes seemed to pierce through the walls. It disappeared only when dawn broke, leaving me trembling and terrified.

One night, I camped near the old army base in Agroprom. Around midnight, I heard faint music playing. Curious, I followed the sound to a dilapidated building. Inside, I found a gramophone playing an old tune, but no one was around. As I approached, the music grew distorted, and I felt a cold hand grip my arm. The air grew heavy, and I saw shadowy figures dancing around me. I bolted out, the music still ringing in my ears. The base is haunted by the ghosts of the past.

Stay away from the northern tunnels near the Radar. I was exploring the area when I heard a low growl. As I entered the tunnel, the growl turned into a roar, and I felt the ground shake. I saw a massive, shadowy figure charging towards me, its eyes glowing red. I fired my gun, but it had no effect. I turned and ran, the figures roars echoing through the tunnel. I barely made it out, and the entrance collapsed behind me. Whatever was in there, it was pure evil.

One evening, I decided to camp near the Jupiter Plant. Around midnight, I heard strange noises coming from the plant. I ventured closer, and saw a figure moving among the ruins. As I approached, the figure disappeared, and the air grew cold. Suddenly, I felt a hand on my shoulder, and heard a voice whispering in my ear, telling me to leave. I turned around, but there was no one there. I ran back to camp, the voice still echoing in my mind.

Avoid the western forest near the Marshes. I was hiking through the area when I heard footsteps behind me. Turning around, I saw a figure standing in the shadows, watching me. As I approached, the figure vanished, and the air grew cold. Suddenly, I felt a presence behind me, and heard a low growl. I turned and saw a pair of glowing eyes staring back at me. I ran, the growl growing louder. I barely made it out, and the forest remains a place of fear and mystery.

Theres a bridge near the Outskirts that everyone says is haunted. One night, I dared to cross it. Halfway across, I heard a low growl from beneath. Looking down, I saw a pair of glowing eyes staring back at me. The bridge started to shake, and I felt something grab my ankle, trying to pull me down. I fought back, managing to break free and sprint to the other side. The bridge is a place of great evil, and it is best left alone.

One evening, I decided to explore the old church in the Dark Valley. As I entered, I heard faint chanting echoing from the walls. The air grew colder, and I saw shadowy figures moving among the pews. Suddenly, the door slammed shut, and I felt a presence behind me. Turning around, I saw a robed figure with glowing eyes, whispering in an unknown language. The walls seemed to close in, and I felt an overwhelming sense of dread. I forced the door open and ran, never looking back.

Soldiers, beware the northern checkpoint. I was on night watch when I saw a figure standing in the middle of the road. Thinking it was an intruder, I approached, but the figure vanished into thin air. Suddenly, I felt a cold hand grip my shoulder, and I heard whispers in a language I couldnt understand. I turned and saw a shadowy figure with glowing eyes. I raised my weapon, but it passed right through. I ran back to the post, the whispers echoing in my mind. The checkpoint is haunted.

Military units, avoid the central outpost at midnight. I was patrolling the area when I heard disturbing screams coming from inside. Thinking it was a trapped civilian, I entered, but the screams turned into agonized cries. The air grew cold, and I saw figures moving in the shadows. Suddenly, one of them lunged at me, its face twisted in pain. I fired my weapon, but it had no effect. I ran, the screams following me all the way back. The outpost is cursed by the spirits of the past.

I barely managed to escape, but the bunker remains a place of great danger.

I turned and saw a shadowy figure standing in the doorway, blocking my exit. I forced my way past and ran, the cries echoing in my ears.

Stay away from the southern ridge near Zaton. I was hiking up the trail when I heard my name being called from the trees. Thinking it was a friend, I followed the voice. I stumbled back, barely avoiding a fall. The figure vanished, and I ran back down, feeling its eyes on me the entire way.

One night, I was camping near the Red Forest. Around midnight, I heard rustling outside my tent. Thinking it was an animal, I unzipped the flap and shone my flashlight. When I looked back, he was gone, but the echo of his scream stayed with me for days.

I was exploring the abandoned village near the Cordon, searching for supplies. As I entered one of the houses, I felt a sudden chill. The air grew thick, and I heard faint whispers. I managed to break free and burst through a window to escape. I still hear the screams in my nightmares.

I screamed and ran blindly, stumbling over rocks and debris. When I finally emerged, I realized I was alone. The warehouse had taken my companions.

One evening, I ventured into the old hotel in Limansk. As I climbed the stairs, I heard a baby crying. Following the sound, I reached the top floor, where I found an old, decrepit room. Inside, the crying grew louder, and I saw a crib in the corner. When I approached, the crying stopped, and a cold breeze swept through the room. The crib was empty, but I felt a presence behind me. I turned and saw a shadowy figure standing in the doorway, blocking my exit. I forced my way past and ran, the cries echoing in my ears.

Stay away from the southern ridge near Zaton. I was hiking up the trail when I heard my name being called from the trees. Thinking it was a friend, I followed the voice. As I got closer, I saw a figure standing at the edge of the ridge, beckoning me. When I reached out, its face twisted into a grotesque grin, and it lunged at me. I stumbled back, barely avoiding a fall. The figure vanished, and I ran back down, feeling its eyes on me the entire way.

One night, I was camping near the Red Forest. Around midnight, I heard rustling outside my tent. Thinking it was an animal, I unzipped the flap and shone my flashlight. To my horror, I saw a man standing just outside, his eyes glowing a sickly green. He reached out, his mouth opening in a silent scream. I scrambled out of the tent and ran as fast as I could. When I looked back, he was gone, but the echo of his scream stayed with me for days.

I was exploring the abandoned village near the Cordon, searching for supplies. As I entered one of the houses, I felt a sudden chill. The air grew thick, and I heard faint whispers. I turned to leave, but the door wouldnt budge. The whispers grew louder, turning into agonized screams. Shadows swirled around me, and I felt hands grabbing at my clothes, pulling me back. I managed to break free and burst through a window to escape. I still hear the screams in my nightmares.

Stay away from the old train yard after dark. One night, I decided to search for spare parts. As I walked among the rusted carriages, I heard footsteps behind me. Turning, I saw nothing but darkness. Suddenly, a shadowy figure lunged at me, its eyes glowing red. I fired my gun, but the bullets passed right through it. I ran, hearing the figures rasping breath right behind me. I only stopped when I reached the safety of the campfire. The train yard is cursed.

I was trekking through the swamps when I got lost. The fog was thick, and visibility was low. Suddenly, I heard my name being called from the mist. I followed the voice, thinking it was a fellow stalker. As I approached, I saw a figure standing in the water, beckoning me. When I got closer, its face twisted into a grotesque grin, and it vanished. The water around me started to bubble, and I felt hands pulling me under. I barely made it out alive, but the swamp left its mark on me.

Theres an old bridge near the Garbage that everyone says is haunted. One night, I dared to cross it. Halfway across, I heard a low growl from beneath. Looking down, I saw a pair of glowing eyes staring back at me. The bridge started to shake, and I felt something grab my ankle, trying to pull me down. I fought back, managing to break free and sprint to the other side. I dont know what lives under that bridge, but Im never going back.

One evening, I decided to explore the old church in the Dark Valley. As I entered, I heard faint chanting echoing from the walls. The air grew colder, and I saw shadowy figures moving among the pews. Suddenly, the door slammed shut, and I felt a presence behind me. Turning around, I saw a robed figure with glowing eyes, whispering in an unknown language. The walls seemed to close in, and I felt an overwhelming sense of dread. I forced the door open and ran, never looking back.

Theres a cave near the Army Warehouses that everyone avoids. One day, curiosity got the better of me, and I went in. The deeper I went, the darker it became. My flashlight flickered, and I heard footsteps echoing behind me. Suddenly, a cold breeze swept through, extinguishing my light. I was plunged into darkness, feeling an icy hand on my shoulder. I screamed and ran blindly, stumbling over rocks and debris. When I finally emerged, I realized I was alone. The cave had taken my companions.

I was scavenging near the old factory in Rostok when I heard a childs laughter. Following the sound, I found a small, abandoned playground. As I approached, the laughter turned into screams, and I saw a little girl standing by the swings, her eyes hollow and black. She pointed at me, and the ground around her started to crack open. I ran, feeling the earth tremble beneath my feet. When I looked back, the playground was gone, replaced by an empty lot.

One night, I decided to camp near the Bar. Around midnight, I heard rustling in the bushes. Thinking it was an animal, I ignored it. Suddenly, I felt a cold hand grip my shoulder. I turned around, but there was nothing there. The hand tightened, and I heard a voice whispering in my ear, telling me to leave. I packed up and ran, feeling the presence follow me all the way to the safety of the campfire. The Bar is haunted, and it doesnt want us there.

Stay away from the Pripyat outskirts. I was exploring the abandoned buildings when I heard footsteps echoing through the halls. As I turned a corner, I saw a figure standing at the end of the hallway, its eyes glowing red. It started to move towards me, and I felt an overwhelming sense of dread. I turned and ran, but the figures footsteps were right behind me. I barely made it out, and when I looked back, the figure was gone. Pripyat is cursed, and its best left alone.

The shadows seemed to close in, and I ran, the whispers following me all the way out. The warehouse is a place of nightmares.

I was walking through the dark alleys of Pripyat when I felt a presence behind me. Turning around, I saw a tall, shadowy figure with glowing eyes. It started to move towards me, and I felt an intense fear. I ran, but the figure followed, its footsteps echoing through the narrow streets. I hid in an old building, but the figures eyes seemed to pierce through the walls. It disappeared only when dawn broke, leaving me trembling and terrified.

One night, I camped near the old army base in Agroprom. Around midnight, I heard faint music playing. Curious, I followed the sound to a dilapidated building. Inside, I found a gramophone playing an old tune, but no one was around. As I approached, the music grew distorted, and I felt a cold hand grip my arm. The air grew heavy, and I saw shadowy figures dancing around me. I bolted out, the music still ringing in my ears. The base is haunted by the ghosts of the past.

Stay away from the northern tunnels near the Radar. I was exploring the area when I heard a low growl. As I entered the tunnel, the growl turned into a roar, and I felt the ground shake. I saw a massive, shadowy figure charging towards me, its eyes glowing red. I fired my gun, but it had no effect. I turned and ran, the figures roars echoing through the tunnel. I barely made it out, and the entrance collapsed behind me. Whatever was in there, it was pure evil.

One evening, I decided to camp near the Jupiter Plant. Around midnight, I heard strange noises coming from the plant. I ventured closer, and saw a figure moving among the ruins. I turned around, but there was no one there. I ran back to camp, the voice still echoing in my mind.

Avoid the western forest near the Marshes. I was hiking through the area when I heard footsteps behind me. Turning around, I saw a figure standing in the shadows, watching me. Freedom fighters, stay away from the forest edge at night. I was on patrol when I saw strange lights moving among the trees. The forest edge is haunted by lost souls, and they dont want us there.

One evening, I ventured into the old hotel in Limansk. As I climbed the stairs, I heard a baby crying. Following the sound, I reached the top floor, where I found an old, decrepit room. Inside, the crying grew louder, and I saw a crib in the corner. When I approached, the crying stopped, and a cold breeze swept through the room. The crib was empty, but I felt a presence behind me. I turned and saw a shadowy figure standing in the doorway, blocking my exit. I forced my way past and ran, the cries echoing in my ears.

Avoid the southern ridge near Zaton. I was hiking up the trail when I heard my name being called from the trees. Thinking it was a friend, I followed the voice. As I got closer, I saw a figure standing at the edge of the ridge, beckoning me. When I reached out, its face twisted into a grotesque grin, and it lunged at me. I stumbled back, barely avoiding a fall. The figure vanished, and I ran back down, feeling its eyes on me the entire way.

Theres an old warehouse in the Garbage that everyone says is cursed. One night, I decided to explore it. As I entered, the air grew thick with dust, and I heard faint whispers. Suddenly, the lights flickered, and I saw shadows moving in the corners. The whispers grew louder, and I felt a cold hand on my back. I turned around, but no one was there. The shadows seemed to close in, and I ran, the whispers following me all the way out. The warehouse is a place of nightmares.

I was walking through the dark alleys of Pripyat when I felt a presence behind me. Turning around, I saw a tall, shadowy figure with glowing eyes. It started to move towards me, and I felt an intense fear. I ran, but the figure followed, its footsteps echoing through the narrow streets. I hid in an old building, but the figures eyes seemed to pierce through the walls. It disappeared only when dawn broke, leaving me trembling and terrified.

One night, I camped near the old army base in Agroprom. Around midnight, I heard faint music playing. Curious, I followed the sound to a dilapidated building. Inside, I found a gramophone playing an old tune, but no one was around. As I approached, the music grew distorted, and I felt a cold hand grip my arm. The air grew heavy, and I saw shadowy figures dancing around me. I bolted out, the music still ringing in my ears. The base is haunted by the ghosts of the past.

Stay away from the northern tunnels near the Radar. I was exploring the area when I heard a low growl. As I entered the tunnel, the growl turned into a roar, and I felt the ground shake. I saw a massive, shadowy figure charging towards me, its eyes glowing red. I fired my gun, but it had no effect. I turned and ran, the figures roars echoing through the tunnel. I barely made it out, and the entrance collapsed behind me. Whatever was in there, it was pure evil.

One evening, I decided to camp near the Jupiter Plant. Around midnight, I heard strange noises coming from the plant. I ventured closer, and saw a figure moving among the ruins. As I approached, the figure disappeared, and the air grew cold. Suddenly, I felt a hand on my shoulder, and heard a voice whispering in my ear, telling me to leave. I turned around, but there was no one there. I ran back to camp, the voice still echoing in my mind.

Avoid the western forest near the Marshes. I was hiking through the area when I heard footsteps behind me. Turning around, I saw a figure standing in the shadows, watching me. As I approached, the figure vanished, and the air grew cold. Suddenly, I felt a presence behind me, and heard a low growl. I turned and saw a pair of glowing eyes staring back at me. I ran, the growl growing louder. I barely made it out, and the forest remains a place of fear and mystery.

Theres a bridge near the Outskirts that everyone says is haunted. One night, I dared to cross it. Halfway across, I heard a low growl from beneath. Looking down, I saw a pair of glowing eyes staring back at me. The bridge started to shake, and I felt something grab my ankle, trying to pull me down. I fought back, managing to break free and sprint to the other side. The bridge is a place of great evil, and it is best left alone.

One evening, I decided to explore the old church in the Dark Valley. As I entered, I heard faint chanting echoing from the walls. The air grew colder, and I saw shadowy figures moving among the pews. Suddenly, the door slammed shut, and I felt a presence behind me. Turning around, I saw a robed figure with glowing eyes, whispering in an unknown language. The walls seemed to close in, and I felt an overwhelming sense of dread. I forced the door open and ran, never looking back.

Theres a cave near the Army Warehouses that everyone avoids. One day, curiosity got the better of me, and I went in. The deeper I went, the darker it became. My flashlight flickered, and I heard footsteps echoing behind me. Suddenly, a cold breeze swept through, extinguishing my light. I was plunged into darkness, feeling an icy hand on my shoulder. I screamed and ran blindly, stumbling over rocks and debris. When I finally emerged, I realized I was alone. The cave had taken my companions.

I was scavenging near the old factory in Rostok when I heard a childs laughter. Following the sound, I found a small, abandoned playground. As I approached, the laughter turned into screams, and I saw a little girl standing by the swings, her eyes hollow and black. She pointed at me, and the ground around her started to crack open. I ran, feeling the earth tremble beneath my feet. When I looked back, the playground was gone, replaced by an empty lot.

One night, I decided to camp near the Bar. Around midnight, I heard rustling in the bushes. Thinking it was an animal, I ignored it. Suddenly, I felt a cold hand grip my shoulder. I turned around, but there was nothing there. The hand tightened, and I heard a voice whispering in my ear, telling me to leave. I packed up and ran, feeling the presence follow me all the way to the safety of the campfire. The Bar is haunted, and it doesnt want us there.

Stay away from the Pripyat outskirts. I was exploring the abandoned buildings when I heard footsteps echoing through the halls. I was trekking through the Red Forest when I got lost. The fog was thick, and visibility was low. Suddenly, I heard my name being called from the trees. I followed the voice, thinking it was a fellow stalker. As I approached, I saw a figure standing in the distance, beckoning me. When I got closer, its face twisted into a grotesque grin, and it vanished. The fog around me started to close in, and I felt hands pulling me deeper into the forest. I barely made it out alive, but the Red Forest left its mark on me.

One night, I was camping near the Dark Valley. Around midnight, I heard rustling outside my tent. Thinking it was an animal, I unzipped the flap and shone my flashlight. To my horror, I saw a man standing just outside, his eyes glowing a sickly green. He reached out, his mouth opening in a silent scream. I scrambled out of the tent and ran as fast as I could. When I looked back, he was gone, but the echo of his scream stayed with me for days.

Stay away from the old train yard after dark. One night, I decided to search for spare parts. As I walked among the rusted carriages, I heard footsteps behind me. Turning, I saw nothing but darkness. Suddenly, a shadowy figure lunged at me, its eyes glowing red. I fired my gun, but the bullets passed right through it. I ran, hearing the figures rasping breath right behind me. I only stopped when I reached the safety of the campfire. The train yard is cursed.

I was exploring the abandoned village near the Cordon, searching for supplies. As I entered one of the houses, I felt a sudden chill. The air grew thick, and I heard faint whispers. I turned to leave, but the door wouldnt budge. The whispers grew louder, turning into agonized screams. Shadows swirled around me, and I felt hands grabbing at my clothes, pulling me back. I managed to break free and burst through a window to escape. I still hear the screams in my nightmares.

Stalkers, be on the lookout. Strange creature spotted near the old mill. Stay sharp.
Just saw something unusual near the swamp. Looked like it was watching me. Anyone else seen it?
The Monolith warns us of a shadowy figure lurking near the western ruins. Approach with caution.
Brothers, a mysterious being has been sighted near the holy grounds. The Monolith guides us.
Clear Sky here. Reports of an unidentified creature near the southern research post. Stay vigilant.
Attention Clear Sky members: Strange sightings reported near the anomaly fields. Proceed with caution.
Soldados, hemos recibido informes de un críptido cerca del puesto de control del norte. Manténganse alerta e informen de cualquier avistamiento.
Unidades militares, criatura no identificada vista cerca del puesto de control central. Abran bien los ojos.
Killer faction, there's talk of a strange beast roaming our territory. Hunt it down.
For Killers: Spotted something unnatural near the old train yard. Stay sharp and ready.
Ecologistas, se ha observado una entidad desconocida cerca del área de investigación de anomalías. Reunid datos y cuidaos.
Informa el Dr. Petróvich: avistamientos misteriosos cerca del laboratorio. Se recomienda precaución a todo el personal.
Duty members, strange creature sighted near the eastern patrol zone. Investigate and report back.
Duty soldier here. Unusual sightings near the water tower. Stay alert and keep your weapons ready.
Freedom fighters, cryptid spotted near the forest edge. Keep your eyes open and report any movements.
Freedom here: Mysterious being seen near the old church. Stay vigilant and avoid unnecessary risks.
Bandits, strange creature spotted near the scrapyard. Approach with caution and inform others.
Heads up, Bandits. Unidentified beast seen in the district. Watch your back and stay together.
Renegades, mysterious sightings reported near our camps. Stay alert and avoid the area if possible.
Contraband moving through our area, Renegades. Find it and keep it out of enemy hands.
Stalkers, remember to clean your rifles regularly. A jammed gun can mean the difference between life and death.
Pro tip: Use a suppressor to stay quiet and avoid attracting unwanted attention from mutants.
Monolith soldiers, ensure your armor is always reinforced. The Zone's dangers spare no one.
Trust in the Monolith and maintain your weapons. A well-kept rifle is a true follower's best friend.
Clear Sky operatives, always check your equipment before a mission. Functioning gear is crucial for our research.
Clear Sky tip: Use the right type of ammo for each encounter. Precision is key.
Soldiers, keep your rifles clean and your magazines full. Discipline starts with your equipment.
Army personnel, use armor-piercing rounds against heavily armored targets. Stay prepared, stay alive.
Killer faction, always sharpen your blades. A dull knife is as good as a dead man.
For Killers: Upgrade your scopes for better accuracy in the dark. Hunt with precision.
Ecologists, keep your protective suits in top condition. Contamination can be fatal.
Technical tip for Ecologists: Regularly calibrate your anomaly detectors for accurate readings.
Duty members, maintain your equipment. A well-maintained weapon is your best defense against the Zone.
Duty soldiers, reinforce your armor before heading out. Protection is paramount.
Freedom fighters, customize your rifles for better handling. A personalized weapon feels like an extension of yourself.
Freedom tip: Use lightweight gear for more mobility in the field. Speed can save your life.
Bandits, a quick repair kit can save your life. Always carry one with you.
Bandit advice: A silenced weapon can be the difference between a successful heist and a firefight.
Renegades, ensure your gear is always in top condition. The Zone is unforgiving to the unprepared.
For Renegades: Always keep a backup weapon. Better safe than sorry.
Stalkers, beware. Rumors of military searching for contraband in the northern sectors.
Heads up, found some contraband stashed near the old mill. Avoid the area if you can.
The Monolith condemns those who defile the Zone with contraband. Report any suspicious activities.
Brothers, be vigilant. Contraband detected near the western perimeter. Purge the unclean.
Clear Sky personnel, recent reports of contraband near the swamps. Stay alert and report any findings.
Attention Clear Sky: Contraband activity spotted in the southern territories. Proceed with caution.
Soldiers, contraband found in the sector. Conduct thorough searches and report immediately.
Military units, be aware: Contraband suspected near the checkpoint. Stay vigilant.
Killer faction, intel suggests contraband being moved through our territory. Keep your eyes peeled.
Watch out, Killers. Contraband detected in our zone. Find it before anyone else does.
Ecologists, contraband materials found near the research station. Avoid the area and notify security.
Attention Ecologists: Contraband activity reported near the anomaly fields. Maintain your distance.
Duty members, contraband discovered within our patrol routes. Conduct searches and report findings.
Alert! Contraband suspected in the eastern sector. Duty soldiers, remain on high alert.
Freedom fighters, contraband moving through the forest areas. Keep an eye out and stay sharp.
Freedom here: Rumors of contraband near the camp. Verify and report any suspicious items.
Bandits, contraband spotted near our stash points. Check it out and secure the goods.
Heads up, Bandits. Contraband detected in the district. Grab it before anyone else does.
Renegades, contraband reported near our camps. Stay alert and secure any found items.
Contraband moving through our area, Renegades. Find it and keep it out of enemy hands.
Hey, anyone seen Vasily? He went scavenging near the old hospital and hasnt checked in. If you see him, let him know were worried.
Just made it to the Bar. If anyone needs supplies or a place to rest, Ill be here for a couple of days.
Anyone know if Oleg made it out of the Red Forest? He was heading there last night and hasnt returned.
Arrived at Yantar safely. Found some good artifacts. If youre nearby, lets trade.
Just got back from the Army Warehouses. Saw some heavy mutant activity. Be careful out there.
Made it to the Cordon. If anyone needs a guide through the Garbage, hit me up. Its getting dangerous out there.
Has anyone seen Igor? Last I heard, he was heading to the old factory in Rostok. Were getting worried.
Just arrived at the Jupiter Plant. Found some interesting anomalies. Anyone else around?
Made it to Skadovsk in one piece. If anyone needs a lift back to Zaton, let me know.
Anyone heard from Dmitri? He was heading towards the Dead City and hasn't been seen since. Let me know if you find him.
Arrived at the Freedom base. Got some supplies to share. If youre nearby, swing by.
Just reached the Monolith territory. Its eerily quiet here. If anyones around, lets meet up.
Reached the eastern swamps. Plenty of anomalies but found some good artifacts. If anyones interested in a trade, get in touch.
Finally got to Pripyat. The place is crawling with Monolith, so stay sharp if youre heading this way.
Anyone seen Nadia? She was supposed to meet us at the old church, but she never showed up. Let us know if you have any info.
Just made it out of the Dark Valley. Found some rare artifacts. If anyone wants to trade, Im at the Bar.
Arrived at the Swamps. Place is flooded, so be careful if youre heading this way.
Anyone know if Sidorovich is still doing business? Need to unload some artifacts and stock up on supplies.
Just got to the Garbage. Plenty of bandits around, so keep your eyes peeled. Anyone up for a raid?
Made it back to the 100 Rads bar. If anyone needs a place to crash or trade, you know where to find me.
The Monolith sees all. Brothers, has anyone seen our comrade Vasily? He was last seen near the Red Forest.
Arrived at the sacred grounds. The Monoliths light guides me. Anyone in need of assistance, come forth.
Brothers, I have reached the outskirts of Pripyat. The Monoliths power is strong here. Join me if you are near.
The Monolith has blessed my journey to the abandoned hospital. If any brothers are in need, seek me out.
Just returned from the western ruins. The Monolith protected me. Any brothers missing? Report in.
Made it to the old factory. The Monoliths whispers guided me. If any brothers are nearby, gather here.
Has anyone seen Brother Igor? He ventured into the Dead City and has not returned. The Monolith watches over him.
The Monolith has led me to Yantar. I await further instructions. Brothers, check in if you are near.
Arrived at the Jupiter Plant. The Monoliths energy is palpable here. Any brothers nearby, let us unite.
Reached the Cordon. The Monoliths presence is faint but guiding. Brothers, report your status.
The Monolith has guided me to the Dark Valley. If any brothers require assistance, I am here.
Brothers, has anyone seen Sister Nadia? She was heading towards the Red Forest and hasnt returned. The Monolith watches over her.
Made it to Limansk. The Monoliths protection was strong. If any brothers are near, come to me.

The Monolith has led me to the outskirts of Pripyat. If any brothers are nearby, gather here for further guidance.

Just arrived at Skadovsk. The Monoliths whispers are faint here. Any brothers nearby, lets unite.

Has anyone seen Brother Dmitri? He was heading towards the Dead City and hasnt been seen since. The Monolith watches over him.
The Monolith has blessed my journey to the Radar. If any brothers are in need, seek me out.
